article_title: MCAS Yuma Marines go gung-ho for Comic-Con
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. og.description: As part of a Single Marine Program volunteer opportunity, approximately 100 Marines and sailors from Marine Corps Air Station-Yuma recently attended the San Diego Comic-Con International.
